In England, in the seven days to 13 January, there were 582,985 new confirmed cases (1,030.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 January, there were 1,021,758 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 43% (438,773 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 January is 13,064,494 (23,102.5 cases per 100,000 population).
